trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Waycross
There were no other sightings in Waycross on or around February 3rd 2012
Summary: Single wing like craft with solid bright white lights on each end.
divs: sighting detailsmy nephew and i saw what we thought was an airplane descending and turning towards our local airport friday, 2\3\12 around 9:00 pm in northern waycross\ware county. we were going south on augusta ave traveling to a local video store and we followed it as it crossed above and it front of us to the right of us and it stopped completely and hovered over a neighborhood about 300 yards off the road we were on (south augusta ave). we stopped the truck and my nephew rolled down the window and the thing had absolutely no sound whatsoever. it sat stationary and looked like one long wing with a bright white light on each end of it. it looked as if it had a back cocked up a few feet of of the wing that was barely visible by the illumination from the white lights on each end of the main section that looked like a single wing. it was so close we could have shot it with a pellet gun. we watched it sit stationary for at least 2 minutes and then i put the truck in drive and drove as fast as i could to the next road to the right (about 30 yards) which took us into the neighborhood that it was sitting on top of. as we turned to the right we saw it still in the same position about a light pole length above the houses and trees. driving and staring at it only a block away, it vanished instantly. it did not fly up, down, left or right. it was simply gone as if someone had turned the lights out. we drove as close as we could to where it was ( maybe 60 feet from what would have been right under it) and there was no sign of anything. whatever it was it never made a sound. the length was a few longer than what the length would be from left wing tip to right wing tip of a small single engine plane.
